text:
When using the padding-top or padding-bottom attribute on some block on the
current page above the basic-link, the sensitive region for this link is not
shifted down.

Workaround: Using nested blocks with space-before and space-after for the inner
block
creator: bugzilla@proefrock.de

text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 3061 ***
